services.title: Premium Taxi Services in Lima
services.description: Taxi company in Lima offering airport transfers, hourly service, and corporate transport.

items.title: Airport Transfers
items.description: Arrive on time and stress-free with our professional drivers. Reliable rides to and from Jorge Chávez International Airport.

items.title: Hourly Service
items.description: Book a vehicle with driver by the hour and move around with flexibility. Ideal for meetings, visits, or city tours.

items.title: Corporate Transport
items.description: Tailored mobility solutions for companies and executives: planned routes, easy invoicing, and personalized service.

about.title: We are Travelcab, your premium taxi company in Lima
about.description: At Travelcab, we redefine mobility in Lima. We are a premium taxi company that combines safety, punctuality, and comfort in every ride. Our purpose is to provide a reliable and exclusive transport experience for tourists, executives, and families looking for a safe taxi service in Lima.
features: Trusted partner of hotels and companies in Lima.
Executive SUVs, Vans, and Minibuses for exclusive transport.

list.name: Philip in London
list.subtitle: Recommended! :)
list.description: Very efficient pickup at the airport - messaging via WhatsApp - and the driver was helpful and cheerful! - recommended :)

list.name: Laura M
list.subtitle: Great experience
list.description: Great driver. Navigating the roads in Lima is not easy but my driver did a great job. She kept in touch w me in regards to where to meet. All in all highly recommend.

list.name: Melissa L
list.subtitle: Highly recommend
list.description: Fantastic service. Highly responsive and communicative. The team is very friendly. I would recommend them to anyone travelling into Lima for airport transport.

list.name: Jose Q
list.subtitle: Reliable and comfortable
list.description: Excellent service. Driver was waiting for us and the vehicle was more than comfortable. They provided the vehicle and driver information in advance. Was an excellent experience.

list.name: Alyson C
list.subtitle: Excellent Service
list.description: Highly recommend this company . Great communication, lots of details including name of driver, car registration and make and where exactly driver will be holding a sign with our name.

list.name: Seth H
list.subtitle: Family trip to Miraflores.
list.description: Excellent service! No complaints at all. Easy pickup and the driver helped with our baggage, which was very helpful with a family of six and all our stuff.

support.title: 24/7 support in Lima
support.description: At Travelcab, we make sure you arrive on time and stress-free. With our 24/7 support team, there is always someone ready to assist you before, during, and after your trip.

card1.title: Reliable
card1.description: Punctuality and safety in every ride.

footer.description1: {first}, a premium transport company in Lima. We offer safe transfers to and from Jorge Chávez International Airport, as well as to other destinations across the city. Our professional drivers and comfortable vehicles ensure you arrive on time and without stress.
footer.description2: We are available 24/7, every day of the week, serving tourists, executives, and companies looking for a safe and reliable taxi service in Lima. Book easily through our platform and travel with peace of mind.
